data.title: Gehrig-Stitt Chapel & Cremation Service, LLC
data.meta_description: George Delbert Leach, the son of Gale E. and Eleanor F. (McBride) Leach was born on October 24, 1957 at Sterling, CO.  He attended grade school in Sterling and graduated from Potter High School with the Class of 1976.   	On January 19, 1980, George was united in marriage to Cindy Worster in Sidney.  George lived in Sidney from 1980-2007 where he worked for the Cheyenne County Roads Department for fourteen years and for the Sidney Public Schools as Maintenance Supervisor for seven years.  Following a move to Greeley, CO he worked for Ensign U.S. Drilling. 	Survivors include:  his wife:  Cindy of Greeley; (2) sons:  Daniel and wife Becky and their son Bryson of Ault, CO and Justin and wife Jillian of Greeley; (1) sister:  Barbara Worster of Sidney and many extended family members and friends. 	George was preceded in death by his parents and (1) brother: Rick.
